sub_title: Education specialist,ESL English Teacher,Math Teacher,Family and Social Life consultant,Certified translator
summary:
I have been teaching for about ten years. I have also worked in private schools, course centers and public schools. I also worked as general manager and education coordinator for a long time. Apart from these, I also worked in marketing, field studies and product development by working in short-term companies during my university years. But the teaching profession reflects my personality and my whole being.I am an educator who loves and enjoys my job. In order to make my profession more professional, I have completed various graduate programs as well as many international certificate programs to be fully equipped in this sense.
I am an educator who has always been appreciated and rewarded wherever I work, and has been promoted in a short time. I am full of love to do my job perfectly, on time and to teach in the best way.

education.field_of_study: Teaching English as a Second or Foreign Language/ESL Language Instructor(TESOL)

certifications.name: Assessment in Higher Education: Professional  Development For Teachers
Being Different in Classroom Activities with Drama

profile_positions.description:
Helping Teachers with lesson preparation, including collecting materials and setting up equipment
Reviewing lessons or lectures with students on a one-on-one basis or in small groups
Supervising students in class, between classes and during recreation periods and field trips
Tracking attendance, grading assignments and calculating grades
Giving extra help to students who need special accommodations or are struggling with a concept
Assisting students with special learning requirements, including disabilities or English as a second language students
Attending faculty meetings and parent conferences
Collaborating with the Teacher to identify students’ issues and recommend solutions
Observing state, school and class rules and regulations
profile_positions.title: Teacher Assistant
